name: Being a Game Maker
description: This is the first game i created. There is no win condition and it is not an attempt to idle. Made with unity. Windows executable. I didnt make anything for linux or mac but if you insist i may try. If you quit on the first screen before entering a name it will create a corrupted file (it will attempt to write an object to file before creating it) so i advice avoiding doing that. If you did that simply delete that file and start over.
